description: Possession number used to group events

formula: Infer from events where team != team_name

description: Total time from first to last event in a possession
Number of passes advancing ≥20% towards goal
Total advancement from start to end
Flag if ball enters final 20% of pitch
Flag if progression occurs through central corridor
Number of pressure events by opposition
Pressures in midfield region (40–70% pitch length)
Ratio of successful duels to total duels
Distance from own goal where possession lost
Standard deviation of X coordinates in possession
Standard deviation of Y coordinates in possession
Average spatial gap between consecutive events
Time between ball loss and next pressure
Mean duration between losses and recoveries
Mean X of first recovery event after turnover
Flag if opponent enters final third within 10s of turnover

formula: home if team_name == home_team else away

column4: 1 if opponent enters final third ≤10s or ≤4 passes else 0
